title: Research
text:
Working paper

Robust estimation of central subspace under the high-dimensional and elliptical-contoured design (with Dr. Qing Mai and Dr. Keqian Min).
Efficient formulation for sliced average variance estimate with variable and dimension selection (with Dr. Xin Zhang).

title: Jing Zeng (曾靖)
text:
International Institute of Finance
School of Management
University of Science and Technology of China

title: About me
text:
My research interests mainly cover dimension reduction, high-dimensional statistics, and tensor data analysis. I am also interested in applications in other fields, e.g., medical science, finance, etc. Recently, I am working on the robust dimension reduction of the high-dimensional heavy-tailed data, and the second-moment based sparse SDR method.

Education

2017/08–2022/05: Ph.D. in Statistics, Florida State University.
2013/08–2017/06: B.S. in Mathematics and Applied Mathematics, University of Science and Technology of China.



Employment

2022/07–Present: Associate Professor (tenure-track), International Institute of Finance, School of Management, University of Science and Technology of China.



Research Interests

Applications in medical science
Dimension reduction
High-dimensional statistics
Machine learning
Robust statistics
Tensor data analysis



Services
